person.name: Boris Fahrnberger
person.bio: Boris has worked in nearly all main sectors, including IT, finance, media and politics. As a senior andragogist and consultant he has helped thousands of people to develop and get inspired. The communication scientist founded Artichoke Computing, a Threefold farming company, in 2019 and recently the project “COVID Fighters”, the quickest biomolecular SARS-CoV-2 testing method on the planet.
person.excerpt: Boris has worked in nearly all main sectors, including IT, finance, media and politics.

node.title: Covid Testing Solution
node.excerpt: Re-gaining social life and staying healthy with covid testing solution on Crystal Twin.
